scripts.build-assets: npm run clean-dist && npm run prepare-dist && npm run build-css && npm run autoprefixer && npm run minify-css && npm run clean-temp-css && npm run build-js && npm run bundle-vendor-extra && npm run copy-vendor-extra && npm run copy-bootstrap && npm run copy-fonts
scripts.build: npm run build-assets && npm run build-pug
scripts.build-assets-dev: npm run clean-dist-dev && npm run prepare-dist && npm run build-css && npm run autoprefixer && npm run build-js-dev && npm run bundle-vendor-extra && npm run copy-vendor-extra && npm run copy-bootstrap && npm run copy-fonts
scripts.dev: npm run copy-vendor-extra && concurrently -n "CSS,JS,PUG,SERVER" -c "green,cyan,blue,magenta" "npm run watch-css" "npm run watch-js" "npm run build-pug -- --watch --dev" "npm run start-server" && npm run bundle-vendor-extra
scripts.copy-vendor-extra: cpx "node_modules/jquery-validation/dist/jquery.validate.js" js/vendor-extra/ && cpx "node_modules/jquery.cookie/jquery.cookie.js" js/vendor-extra/ && cpx "node_modules/toastr/build/toastr.min.js" js/vendor-extra/ && cpx "js/vendor-extra/**/*.{js,css}" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/exif-js/exif.js" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/fastclick/lib/fastclick.js" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/enquire.js/dist/enquire.js" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/masonry-layout/dist/masonry.pkgd.js" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/imagesloaded/imagesloaded.pkgd.js" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/riot/riot+compiler.min.js" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/jquery-hotkeys/jquery.hotkeys.js" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/magnific-popup/dist/jquery.magnific-popup.js" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/jquery-nestable/jquery.nestable.js" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/twitter-bootstrap-wizard/jquery.bootstrap.wizard.js" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/jasny-bootstrap/dist/js/jasny-bootstrap.min.js" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/nanoscroller/bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/jquery-mousewheel/jquery.mousewheel.js" dist/js/vendor/ && cpx "node_modules/jquery-smooth-scroll/jquery.smooth-scroll.js" dist/js/vendor/
